tut:
Reach the end of the route to finish the level.
Collect coins to buy upgrades, cars or tracks.
tut_desk: Use the arrow keys or click the padels to navigate the car.
tut_mobile: Use the pedals to navigate the car.
up_car_tyre_all: Improves the adhesion and power delivery to the ground.
up_car_fuel_all: Increases the capacity of the fuel tank.
up_car_susp_all: Improves the stability at high speeds and bumps.
up_car_engine_all: Increases power, speed and acceleration. Increases the fuel usage.
up_car_spec_complex: A special complex upgrade for this car.
up_car_spec_jumps: Better speed and easier control of flips while jumping.
up_car_spec_wheels: Lifts the car for an easy mountain ride.
up_car_mega_fuel: Increases the capacity of the fuel tank even more!
